modality: Anxiety and movement aggravate heat and thirst
notes: Seen in acute states of fear, worry or pain

rubric: Thirst during chill stage of fever
modality: Chill with desire to drink despite shivering
Thirst comes as a premonitory symptom
notes: Important for early stages of infection or prodrome

rubric: Thirst during fever with dryness of throat despite drinking
modality: Drinking gives only temporary relief
notes: Seen in bronchitis, diphtheria, laryngitis-related fevers

rubric: Thirst during fever alternating with aversion to water
modality: Fluctuation between craving and aversion
notes: Seen in psychological or erratic fever patterns

rubric: Thirst during fever better from small sips frequently
modality: Small repeated drinks preferred over large quantities
notes: Very useful rubric in differential diagnosis
